# 69. ✅ upgrade DlnDestination to 1.7.0; whitelist several routers

Date of creation: 09.02.2026



#### Upgrade DlnDestination to 1.7.0

DlnSource (core contract – highest importance, low complexity change)   
This upgrade is medium severity with several features on board:

 a new way for solvers to fulfill users' cross-chain orders carrying over a change appeared on the origin chain,

an new authorized way to handle cross-chain orders' cancellations on behalf of the user,

some minor performance improvements.

New implementation is 0xE540eb6BfEE129d28d47E26Ad33a138d66FD78f5

#### WhiteList Routers

Interact with:  0x663DC15D3C1aC63ff12E45Ab68FeA3F0a883C251

```
 function updateSupportedRouter(
        address _srcSwapRouter,
        bool _isSupported
    ) 
    
  function updateAllowanceAggregator(
        address _router,
        address _allowanceAggregator
    )  
```


- Ethereum
   - Whitelist BitGet 0xbc1d9760bd6ca468ca9fb5ff2cfbeac35d86c973
   - deBridge Router 0x1f012ab159b5b1b5a72cc85142c629783f500ce7

- BNB
   - Whitelist BitGet 0xbc1d9760bd6ca468ca9fb5ff2cfbeac35d86c973
   - deBridge Router 0xb8c5242a3ef822aa663d2d8a4ddf4a806e307a57

- Polygon
   - Whitelist BitGet 0xbc1d9760bd6ca468ca9fb5ff2cfbeac35d86c973
   - deBridge Router 0xb8c5242a3ef822aa663d2d8a4ddf4a806e307a57

- Base
   - Whitelist BitGet 0xbc1d9760bd6ca468ca9fb5ff2cfbeac35d86c973
   - deBridge Router 0xb8c5242a3ef822aa663d2d8a4ddf4a806e307a57

- Arbitrum
   - Whitelist BitGet 0xbc1d9760bd6ca468ca9fb5ff2cfbeac35d86c973
   - deBridge Router 0xb8c5242a3ef822aa663d2d8a4ddf4a806e307a57

- Avalanche
   - deBridge Router 0xb8c5242a3ef822aa663d2d8a4ddf4a806e307a57

- OPTIMISM
   - deBridge Router 0xb8c5242a3ef822aa663d2d8a4ddf4a806e307a57
